description: Calculates optimal settlement routes and initiates payment requests for group expenses

result.instructions: To calculate a settlement plan for your roommate group expenses, please provide the list of all group members and each person's contributions and/or how much each individual owes or is owed. Once provided, I will generate the optimal settlement plan to minimize the number of transactions.
